pullRequest.title: Tools for list Sponsors and SponsoredMembers
pullRequest.bodyText:
listOfMembersSponsoredByUser lists members (memberId,Name) sponsored by entered user
listOfSponsorsForMember lists sponsor (userId,Name) for entered member
setSponsorshipForMember updated to be able to set expiration of
sponsorship (validityTo option)

nodes.bodyText: I am afraid this method is deprecated. Please, use usersManager/getSponsorsForMember instead.

This line is probably not working correctly for parameter '-v'. It shoudl be:
"validityTo|v=s" > $exp,
This message is not correct for this script.

Name of the script should be probably little different. I would prefer:

listOfMembersSponsoredByUserInVo
This message is not correct for this script.

beforeCommit.message:
Tools for list Sponsors ana SponsoredMembers

listOfMembersSponsoredByUser lists members (memberId,Name) sponsored by entered user
listOfSponsorsForMember lists sponsor (userId,Name) for entered member
setSponsorshipForMember updated to be able to set expiration of
sponsorship (validityTo option)

afterCommit.message:
Tools for list Sponsors ana SponsoredMembers

listOfMembersSponsoredByUser lists members (memberId,Name) sponsored by entered user
listOfSponsorsForMember lists sponsor (userId,Name) for entered member
setSponsorshipForMember updated to be able to set expiration of
sponsorship (validityTo option)

Updated texts in listOfMembersSponsoredByUserInVo and
listOfSponsorsForMember.
Cerrected option -v in setSponsorshipForMember
Method getSponsorForMember from UsersManager has been used instead
method getSponsors from MembersManager

nodes.bodyText: Would be great to have more "get" method for listing sponsors (at least firstName and lastName).

commit.message:
Tools for list Sponsors ana SponsoredMembers

listOfMembersSponsoredByUser lists members (memberId,Name) sponsored by entered user
listOfSponsorsForMember lists sponsor (userId,Name) for entered member
setSponsorshipForMember updated to be able to set expiration of
sponsorship (validityTo option)

Updated texts in listOfMembersSponsoredByUserInVo and
listOfSponsorsForMember.
Corrected option -v in setSponsorshipForMember
Method getSponsorForMember from UsersManager has been used instead
method getSponsors from MembersManager

removed listOfMembersSponsoredByUser
Updated bean Sponsor, getUserFirstName and getUserLastName added
updated listOfSponsorsForMember, newly created getUserFirstName and
getUserLastNam used for listing
